snippet: Already on high alert after the ambush killings of two officers last month, the New York Police Department on Wednesday urged its patrol force to take further precautions.
abstract: New York Police Dept, already on high alert after two police officers were fatally ambushed in Brooklyn, issue call for further precautions in wake of deadly attack on Paris newspaper.
lead_paragraph: Already on high alert after the ambush killings of two officers last month, the New York Police Department on Wednesday urged its patrol force to take further precautions.

headline.main: New York Officers on Even Higher Alert After Paris Attack
headline.print_headline: Officers on Even Higher Alert After Paris Attack
